description: Cost-optimized configuration profile - reduces Azure costs while maintaining acceptable quality

chat.description: Cost-optimized chat model - ~80% cheaper than gpt-4o with slightly lower quality

embedding.description: Smaller embedding model - 50% dimensionality reduction, ~60% cost savings

search.notes: Reduced from 5 to 3 results - fewer API calls and tokens processed

images.notes: Limit images to reduce blob storage egress costs

_profile_notes.use_case: Development, testing, or production workloads with budget constraints
_profile_notes.cost_savings: Approximately 70-80% cost reduction compared to base configuration
_profile_notes.tradeoffs: Slightly lower quality responses, fewer search results, reduced image support
